faqs.question: Does Booking a Vacation Rental Require Having an Account?
faqs.answer: No. To book a stay, just click on the desired hotel. You will then be taken to the booking page by clicking on the Booking Calendar. You will either make your reservation via the LifeVistaVacation.com website, or via the owner's preferred method.
